title: Highest Greenhouse Gas Emissions Per Capita
description: In 2023, Palau recorded a staggering 84.71 tons of CO2 equivalent per capita, making it one of the highest emitters per person globally.

title: Leading Carbon Dioxide Emissions Per Capita
description: Palau's CO2 emissions per capita reached 81.21 tons in 2023, placing it among the top countries in terms of individual carbon footprint.

title: High Carbon Intensity of GDP
description: In 2023, Palau's carbon intensity was 6.56 kg CO2e per constant 2015 US$ of GDP, indicating a high level of emissions relative to economic output.

title: Significant Carbon Intensity in PPP GDP
description: With a carbon intensity of 5.14 kg CO2e per 2021 PPP $ of GDP in 2023, Palau's economy is heavily reliant on carbon-intensive activities.

title: Top International Tourism Receipts as Percentage of Exports
description: In 2017, international tourism accounted for 93.52% of Palau's total exports, highlighting its reliance on tourism as a major economic driver.

title: Lowest Current Account Balance
description: In 2022, Palau had a current account balance of -52.99% of GDP, indicating a significant deficit compared to global standards.

title: Minimal Methane Emissions Reduction
description: Palau achieved a remarkable reduction in methane emissions, with a 77.44% decrease from 1990 levels by 2023.

title: Low Nitrous Oxide Emissions from Waste
description: In 2023, Palau's nitrous oxide emissions from waste were minimal, recorded at just 0.0001 Mt CO2e.

title: Minimal Revenue Excluding Grants
description: In 2020, Palau's revenue excluding grants was 62,717,000 LCU, one of the lowest globally.

title: Low Goods and Services Expense
description: Palau's expenditure on goods and services was 28,064,000 LCU in 2020, reflecting a conservative spending approach.

title: Small Merchandise Exports
description: In 2023, Palau's merchandise exports were valued at 2,000,000 US$, indicating a limited export economy.

title: High Unemployment with Advanced Education (Female)
description: In 2020, 0.417% of Palau's female labor force with advanced education were unemployed, a relatively low figure.

title: Limited Primary Education Enrollment
description: By 2023, Palau had 1,401 pupils enrolled in primary education, reflecting a small student population.
